nodes.bodyText: Do we really need this warning? It looks a bit too intrusive? I might misunderstand it but won't you have the warning as soon as you enable the extension?
Intrusive? How so? The warning will only be displayed during build time if no webjar dependencies were are added to the build, which makes this extension useless.
Sure but that's not how other extensions behave. You don't have a warn if you don't have any Hibernate ORM entities for instance.
I see, perhaps it should display the encountered webjars then? Or do you want to completely remove it?
